data.message: rvaughn4thEminem I don't know if you'll even see my message to you beings I'm just a speck to you in a ocean of fans but I pray you'll be able to see this and help me , I'm 14 and my name is Richard Vaughn. You're my favorite rap artist. I need your help and guidance. How can I tell a girl I love her when she acts differently towards me when we're alone as opposed to her being around friends and when her parents won't even allow her to look at me?
